body:
There's a simple solution that doesn't require `Module.is_cuda()`. Use whatever condition that decides if you move the model to the GPU to move the inputs:

```python
is_cuda = torch.cuda.is_available()
if is_cuda:
  model.cuda()
  batch = Variable(batch.data.cuda())
  target = Variable(target.data.cuda())
```
